price: 83. Paženklintą jūsų Viešpaties. Ir jie netgi netoli nuo Zalimūn (daugiadievių, bloga darančiųjų).
arabic: مُّسَوَّمَةً عِندَ رَبِّكَۖ وَمَا هِيَ مِنَ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ بِبَعِيدٖ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: musawwamatan ʿinda rabbika wamā hiya mina al-ẓālimīna bibaʿīdin
